messages.subject: apologies for my email program
messages.msgSnippet: hi, i just want to say i m sorry my emailer seems to have a mind of its own  from time to time.  it s a beta version of green (a french program for the mac -
messages.messageBody:
hi,

i just want to say i'm sorry my emailer seems to have a mind of its
own from time to time. it's a beta version of green (a french
program for the mac - i'm trying to move away from the big commerial
programs) and it is a bit quirky as is the nature of beta programs:)
for example friday it sent my message- RE: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]
spanking - while i was still typing it, so i didn't get a chance to
sign my name or spell ck. and sometimes it double or even triple
sends my messages. i hope they have the finished version available
soon<g> sorry for the inconvince.

-susan,
austin, tx
